title: Rocket League for PC
description:
CDKeys offers Steam downloads of Rocket League for Windows for $7.89. That's the best price we could find for this soccer-meets-driving game by $8, although it was pennies less two weeks ago.

Note: New customers can provide an email address on the CDKeys Facebook page to get a unique coupon code that cuts an extra 5% off.

title: Electric Fireplace with 44" Mantle
description: Walmart offers this Electric Fireplace with 44" Mantle in Black for $119. Opt for in-store pickup to drop it to $116.91. (You can also opt for free shipping if you aren't interested in the pickup discount.) That's $10 under our mention from a week ago, $64 off list, and the lowest price we've seen. This 3,750-BTU fireplace is designed to heat rooms up to 325 square feet.

title: Dr. Bronner's 32-oz. Pure-Castile Liquid Soap
description:
With orders of $25 or more, Amazon offers the Dr. Bronner's Pure-Castile Liquid Soap 32-oz. Bottle in Lavender for $8.22 with free shipping. That's $2 under our mention from two days ago and the lowest price we could find by $10. It features organic and vegan ingredients.

Note: This item is part of Amazon's "add-on" program and can only be purchased with orders of $25 or more.

title: Under Armor Men's Forest 03 Jacket (size L)
description: Cabela's offers the Under Armour Men's Ridge Reaper Forest 03 Jacket for $29.98 plus $5.95 for shipping. (Pickup may be available in select areas.) That's the lowest price we could find by $170. It's available in L only.

title: Bob the Builder Transforming Scoop
description: Amazon offers Prime members the Fisher-Price Bob the Builder Transforming Scoop for $13.65 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $19. It features two modes of play (vehicle mode and playset mode) and Scoop's back arm converts into a functioning vehicle ram.

title: LifeStraw Mission Water Purification System
description: Exclusively for Prime members, Amazon offers the LifeStraw Mission Water Purification System for $74.99 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $55. This BPA-free device enables you to safely drink contaminated water. It purports to remove almost 100% of waterborne bacteria and protozoan parasites and will filter up to 18,000 liters of water.

title: Breville Juice Fountain Plus Juice Extractor
description: Bloomingdale's offers the Breville Juice Fountain Plus 850-watt Juice Extractor for $89.99. Plus, Loyallist members bag free shipping. (Not a member? It's free to join.) That's the lowest price we could find by $12. It features an 850-watt dual-speed motor, stainless-steel cutting disc, safety locking, and dishwasher-safe parts.

title: Modway Edge Ergonomic Mesh Back Office Chair
description: Amazon offers the Modway Edge Ergonomic Mesh Back Vinyl Office Chair With Flip-Up Arms in Black for $122.39 with free shipping. (Home Depot charges the same.) That's the lowest price we could find by $22. It features adjustable height, tilt, and tension.

title: Monarch Bonded Leather Swivel Glider Recliner
description: Amazon offers the Monarch Specialties Bonded Leather Swivel Glider Recliner in Charcoal Grey for $246.45 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $38. It reclines to about 30° and features a retractable footrest.

title: Soufull Stainless Steel Poultry Scissors
description: yichengjin via Amazon offers the Soufull Multi-Functional Stainless Steel Scissors for $12.88. Coupon code "black855" cuts that to $8.55. Plus, Prime members bag free shipping. Deal ends January 31.

title: Filtrete Air Filters at Amazon
description: Amazon cuts up to 15% off a selection of Filtrete air filters. (Prices are as marked, and although the discount is advertised as up to 15% off, we found even bigger cuts.) Plus, all qualify for free shipping.

title: RCA 43" 4K LED LCD UHD TV
description: Walmart offers the RCA 43" 4K LED-Backlit LCD Ultra HD TV, model no. RTU4300, for $269.99 with free shipping. That's tied with our November mention and the lowest price we could find by $38. It features a 3840x2160 (2160p) native resolution, LED backlight, and four HDMI inputs.

title: Razor Power Core 90 Electric Scooter
description: Walmart offers the Razor Power Core 90 Electric Scooter in Green or Pink for $88 with free shipping. (Amazon offers it for the same price.) That's tied with our November mention and the lowest price we could find by $12. It features a top speed of 10mph, hand-operated front brake, retractable kick stand, and ride time of up to 70 minutes.

title: American Rag Women's Faux-Fur Hooded Parka
description: Macy's offers the American Rag Women's Faux-Fur Hooded Parka in several colors (Olive/White Combo pictured) for $39.99. Pad your order with a beauty item (they start at $3) to bag free shipping; otherwise, shipping adds $10.95. That's $57 off and the lowest price we could find. It's available in select sizes from XXS to XL. Deal ends January 7.

title: Bell Automotive Roadside Emergency Kit
description: Pep Boys via eBay offers the Bell Automotive Products Premium Roadside Emergency Kit for $35.99 with free shipping. That's $9 under the lowest price we could find for a similar set elsewhere. The kit includes an 8-foot booster cable, tire sealant, LED flashlight, three AAA batteries, glow sticks, multi-tool, slip joint pliers, 2-in-1 screwdriver, 24" elastic tie down, cable ties, electrical tape, duct tape, shop towel, nitrile gloves, jersey gloves, safety vest, rain poncho, fleece blanket, space blanket, first aid kit, and a help sign.

title: Nike Men's Therma Fit KO Crew Shirt
description: Proozy offers the Nike Men's Therma Fit KO Crew Shirt in several colors (Black pictured) for $19.99 with free shipping. That's $35 off and the lowest price we could find. It's available in sizes XS L to 3XL.

title: Bosch 12V 2-Speed Drill/Driver Kit
description: Amazon offers the Bosch 12-volt 2-Speed Drill/Driver Kit for $99 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $28. It includes two batteries, charger, and carrying case.

title: JOOLA Table Tennis Table Cover
description: Walmart offers the JOOLA Table Tennis Table Cover for $21.60. (Sears offers it for the same price.) Opt for in-store pickup to dodge the $5.99 shipping charge. That's the lowest price we could find by $8. It fits standard 9x5-foot tables.

title: Field & Stream Men's Leather Watch
description: Time to Shade offers the Field & Stream Men's Leather Watch for $50. Coupon code "DNEWS75" cuts that price to $12.50. With around $7 for shipping (it varies by location), that's $137 off and the lowest price we could find. It features a leather strap, steel bezel, quartz movement, and water resistance to 165 feet.

title: Chase Freedom Unlimited® Card
Casual Home Nolan 4-Shelf Ladder Bookcase
description: Home Depot offers the Casual Home Nolan 4-Shelf Folding Ladder Bookcase in White for $89.50 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $49. It measures 60" x 24" x 16". Deal ends January 7.

title: XtremepowerUS 1,500W Infrared Fireplace
description: Id-rack via eBay offers the XtremepowerUS 1,500-watt Infrared Fireplace in Honey Oak for $119.99 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $7. It features a remote control, timer, and dimmer.

title: Under Armour Hustle 3.0 Backpack
description: Dick's Sporting Goods offers the Under Armour Hustle 3.0 Backpack in several colors (Black/Steel pictured) for $39.98 with free shipping. (Zappos offers it for the same price.) That's the lowest price we could find by $15. It's water repellent and features a laptop sleeve, side pockets, and a shoe pocket.

title: Kathy Ireland Mulholland Swing Arm Floor Lamp
description: Lamps Plus offers the Kathy Ireland Mulholland Swing Arm Floor Lamp for $99.95 with free shipping. That's $100 off and the lowest price we could find. It stands at 61" tall and features a swing arm. Deal ends January 28.

title: G.H. Bass Men's Washed Canvas Oxford Shoes
description: Nashville Shoe Warehouse via eBay offers the G.H. Bass & Co. Men's Proctor Premium Washed Canvas Oxford Shoes in Black for $34.99 with free shipping. That's tied with last month's mention and the lowest price we could find by $20. They're available in select sizes from 7 to 13.

title: Quest Hard Arm Chair
description: Dick's Sporting Goods offers the Quest Hard Arm Chair in Red for $14.97 plus $5.99 for shipping. That's tied with our October mention and the lowest price we could find by $13. It features a beverage holder, carry bag, and weight capacity of 300 lbs.

title: Joy Mangano Miracle Mop Bucket
description: Macy's offers the Joy Mangano Miracle Mop Bucket in Purple or Fuchsia for $14.99. Coupon code "WKND" cuts the price to $12.74. (HSN via eBay charges about the same.) Pad your order with a beauty item (they start at $3) to bag free shipping; otherwise, shipping adds $10.95. That's the lowest price we could find by $5. It features a 4-gallon capacity, easy-pour spout, and locking handle. Deal ends January 7.

title: Polaris Women's Asymmetrical Hoodie
description: Fix_my_toys via eBay offers the OEM Polaris Women's Asymmetrical Sweatshirt Hoodie in Black for $29.95 with free shipping. That's $30 off and the lowest price we could find. It's available in sizes XS to L.

title: Martha Stewart Collection 3-Pc. Zesting Set
description: Macy's offers the Martha Stewart Collection 3-Pice Zesting Set for $9.03. Pad your order with a beauty item (they start at $3) to bag free shipping; otherwise, shipping adds $10.95. That's $14 off list and the lowest price we could find. It features a zester, peeler, and paring knife.

title: Marriott Rewards® Premier Credit Card
Home Decorators Collection East India Buffet
description: Home Depot offers the Home Decorators Collection East India Walnut Buffet for $99.50. Opt for in-store pickup to dodge the $25 shipping charge. That's the lowest price we could find by $50. It measures 21" x 28". Deal ends January 7.

title: Greatest Ghost & Horror Stories Kindle eBook
description: Amazon offers The Greatest Ghost and Horror Stories Ever Written Kindle eBook for free. That's the lowest price we could find by a buck. It includes 30 stories by renowned authors such as Edgar Allan Poe, H.P. Lovecraft, H.G. Wells, Franz Kafka, and Bram Stoker.

title: Alpine Swiss Men's Leather Zip Around Wallet
description: Alpine Swiss Store via Amazon offers the Alpine Swiss Men's Leather Zip Around Wallet in several colors (Antique Brown pictured) for $12.74 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $2. It features a zipper closure, card case, and two separate bill compartments.

title: Young Adult Books at Amazon
description:
Amazon takes up to 50% off a selection of young adult books, with prices starting from $4.99. Plus, Amazon Prime members bag free shipping. A couple of best bets:
  • Gwenda Bond's Girl on a Wire for $4.99 (same at Walmart; low by $2)
  • Carrie Anne Noble's The Mermaid's Sister for $5.99 (pictured, same at Walmart; low by $4)

title: Optimum Nutrition 100% Whey Protein 10-lb Bag
description:
Amazon offers the Optimum Nutrition 100% Whey Gold Standard Protein Powder 10-lb. Bag in Double Rich Chocolate for $65.61. Order via Subscribe & Save to drop it to $62.33. With free shipping, that's the lowest price we could find by $38. It offers 24g of whey protein per serving.

Be sure to cancel Subscribe & Save after your order ships to avoid being charged for subsequent orders.

title: Ergotron WorkFit-T Sit-Stand Workstation
description:
Hayneedle offers the Ergotron WorkFit-T Sit-Stand Desktop Workstation in White for $350.16 with free shipping. Excluding the mention below, that's the lowest price we could find by $19. It creates a standing desk when you place it on top of your existing work surface.

Prefer black? Dell has it for $359.99 with free shipping.

title: Dungeonism for iPhone and iPad
description: iTunes offers downloads of Dungeonism for iPhone and iPad for free. That's $2 off list and the first time this retro-styled dungeon crawler has been free.

title: Streets of Rage Classic for iOS / Android
description: iTunes offers downloads of Streets of Rage Classic for iPhone and iPad for free. (Google Play also has the Android version for free.) That's $1 off list and the lowest price we could find for this classic side-scrolling brawler.

title: Habit List for iPhone / iPad
description: iTunes offers Habit List for iPhone and iPad for free. That's $4 off list and the best we could find. It allows you to track your progress, view trends over time, and features flexible scheduling to reach your goals.

title: Liberty Mutual Auto Insurance
description:
Liberty Mutual offers discounted rates on policies for teen drivers. You may qualify for rate reductions if your teen is:
  • Under the age of 21 and completes a qualifying driver training program
  • living at a school more than 100 miles from your home and occasionally drives your vehicle
  • under the age of 25, who achieve at least a B (3.0) average

title: Kubic for iPhone and iPad
description: iTunes offers downloads of Kubic for iPhone and iPad for free. (Google Play has the Android version for free too.) That's $2 off list and the lowest price we could find. It features iPhone X support, reduced file size, and a new zoom and drag feature.

title: Meditation Studio for iPhone and iPad
description: iTunes offers Meditation Studio for iPhone and iPad for free. That's $4 off list and the lowest price we could find. It features guided and unguided meditation settings. Three subscription tiers are available.

title: Afterlight for iPhone and iPad
description: iTunes offers downloads of Afterlight for iPhone and iPad for free. (Google Play also has the Android version for free.) That's $1 off list and the lowest price we could find. It features 128 adjustable frames, 78 textures, 79 filters, and 15 adjustment tools.

title: Frederick's of Hollywood Semi-Annual Sale
description:
Frederick's of Hollywood takes up to 70% off sitewide during its Semi-Annual Sale. (Prices are as marked.) Plus, take an extra 20% off via coupon code "ABX220". Shipping starts at $9.95, but orders of $75 or more (after discount) qualify for free shipping. Deal ends January 8.

See all Frederick's of Hollywood Coupons.

title: Dell AMD W4100 2GB Graphics Card
description: Dell Home, via its Member Purchase Program, offers its Dell AMD FirePro W4100 2GB 128-bit GDDR5 PCI-Express 3.0 x16 Video Card for $113.99 with free shipping. That's $19 under our October mention and the lowest price we could find today by $66. It supports display resolutions up to 4096x2160 and features four mini DisplayPort outputs, an active fansink cooler, and support for OpenCL 1.2, OpenGL 4.5, and DirectX 12.

title: Refurb TCL 55" 4K LED UHD Roku Smart TV
description:
Walmart continues to offer the refurbished TCL 55" 4K LED-Backlit Ultra HD Roku Smart Television, model no. 55S401, for $335 with free shipping. That's tied with our refurb mention from two weeks ago and $65 under the lowest price we could find for a new one today. It features content streaming via Roku TV (Netflix, YouTube, Hulu Plus, more), USB, and three HDMI inputs.

Note: A 90-day warranty applies, but it's unclear who backs it.

title: Dell Dual Monitor Arm
description: Dell Home, via its Member Purchase Program, offers its Dell Dual Monitor Arm for $189.99 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $41. It features a -20° to 60° tilt, 11.9 cm lift, 180° pan, and is compatible with any VESA compliant monitors.

title: MuscleTech Whey Protein Powder 10-lb. Bag
description:
Amazon offers the MuscleTech NitroTech Whey Protein Powder 10-lb. Bag in Milk Chocolate for $52.20 with free shipping via the steps below. That's the lowest price we could find by $32. It delivers 30g of whey protein per serving. To get this deal:
  1. Select MuscleTech Whey Protein Powder 10-lb. Bag in Milk Chocolate for $84.94
  2. clip the 10% off coupon on the product page
  3. order via Subscribe & Save to drop it to $52.20 in-cart
Note: Be sure to cancel your subscription once your order ships to avoid being billed for further shipments.

title: Quadro Nvidia P1000 4GB Video Card
description: Dell Home, via its Member Purchase Program, offers its Quadro Nvidia P1000 4GB Video Card for $261.24 with free shipping. That's $264 off list and the lowest price we could find. It features four mini DisplayPort 1.4 connectors and Nvidia Mosaic, Iray, and MentalRay support.

title: Verizon Fios Gigabit Connection w/ TV
description: Verizon offers new customers its Verizon Fios Double Play Bundle, which includes 940/880 Mbps Fios Gigabit Internet and Verizon Fios Custom TV, for $74.99 per month. (This price is valid for 12 months.) Also, the standard setup charge is waived, a $99.99 value. Plus, switch to Fios and get out of your contract with up to a $500 credit to help cover your early termination fee.

title: Udemy Cryptocurrency Trading Course
description: Udemy offers the Cryptocurrency Trading Course for $10.99. That's $189 off and the lowest price we could find, although we saw it for a buck less in November. The course contains lifetime access to 3.5 hours of video content. Deal ends January 10.

title: Dell Slim Single Monitor Arm
description: Dell Small Business offers its Dell Slim Single Monitor Arm for $62.69 with free shipping. That's $27 off list and the lowest price we could find. It supports monitors up to 27" and features -25° to 41° tilt and -90° to 90° pan adjustments.

title: LG 55" 4K LED HDR UHD Smart TV
description:
Walmart offers the LG 54.6" 4K HDR IPS LED-Backlit LCD Ultra HD Smart Television, model no. 55UJ6200, for an in-cart price of $468 with free shipping. That's tied with our mention from a week ago and the lowest price we could find now by $29.

It features a 3840x2160 (4K, 2160p) native resolution, active HDR, 4K upscaling, 802.11ac wireless, webOS 3.5 (with access to Hulu Plus, Netflix, YouTube, more), USB, and three HDMI inputs.

title: Ergotech Freedom Stand Dual Workstation
description: Dell Small Business offers the Ergotech Freedom Stand Dual Workstation for $349.99 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $50. It allows one to convert any surface into a sit-stand desk and features a height-adjustable keyboard tray, cup holder, and two removable VESA monitor mount points.

title: Dell SATA 6Gbps 2.5" SSDs
description:
Dell Small Business discounts a range of its Dell Serial ATA 6Gb/s 2.5" SSDs, with prices starting from $89.99, as listed below. Plus, these orders bag free shipping. The deals:
  • Dell 256GB SATA 6Gb/s 2.5" SSD for $89.99 (low by $81)
  • Dell 256GB SATA 6Gb/s 2.5" SSD Upgrade Kit for $109.99 (low by $85f)
  • Dell 512GB SATA 6Gb/s 2.5" SSD for $169.99 (low by $164)

title: Linksys AC Dual-Band Router, Roccat Headset
description:
Dell Small Business offers the Linksys AC3200 Dual-Band Gigabit Router, bundled with the Roccat Cross Over-Ear Headset, for $299.98 with free shipping. That's $20 under the lowest price we could find for these items sold separately elsewhere.

The router features four antennas, four gigabit LAN ports, two USB ports, and a prioritization engine designed to protect against lag spikes. The headset features 50mm neodymium drivers, swappable in-line and boom arm mics, and a 20Hz to 20kHz frequency response.

title: BeatMaker for iPhone / iPad
description: iTunes offers BeatMaker for iPhone / iPad for free. That's $5 off list and the lowest price we could find. It features 16 sample-based trigger pads with multi-touch support, a multi-track song sequencer, and live pattern recording.

title: Used Wii U 32GB w/ Used Mario, Smash Bros
description:
GameStop offers the used Nintendo Wii U 32GB Console in Black bundled with used copies of Super Mario 3D World for Wii U and Super Smash Brothers for Wii U for $169.99 plus $8.99 for shipping. That's about $44 under what you'd expect to pay for a refurbished console with these games new elsewhere.

Note: No warranty info is provided; however, each item is covered by a 7-day money-back guarantee.

title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle
description:
Walmart offers the Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle in Honey Clementine for $10.99. (Amazon charges the same, although it's not expected to ship for 1 to 2 months.) Choose in-store pickup to dodge the $5.99 shipping fee. That's the lowest price we could find by $11. It measures 6.6" x 4" and offers up to 150 hours of burn time.

Update: It's now available for in-store pickup only.

title: Barclaycard Arrival Plus™ MasterCard®
Tacklife Tape Measure
description:
Tacklife Direct via Amazon offers the Tacklife Tape Measure for $13.97. Coupon code "ITE6FSIU" cuts the price to $8.38. With free shipping for Prime members, that's $6 off list and the lowest price we could find. It measures up to 66-feet long, features anti-slip gripping, and is impact resistant. Deal ends January 10.

Note: The Tacklife Tape Measure is also available in a larger size for $11.38 via the same coupon code. It measures 164-feet long.

title: Burton Bullet Snowboard Tool
description: REI offers the Burton Bullet Snowboard Tool in Black for $9.83. Opt for in-store pickup to dodge the $5.99 shipping fee. That's tied with our November mention and is the lowest price we could find by $8. It features a fold-out handle, a secret compartment, a #2 and #3 Phillips screwdriver as well as a flathead, 4mm Allen key, and a 10mm wrench.

title: Tacklife Noise Reduction Safety Ear Muffs
description: Tacklife via Amazon offers Prime members the Tacklife Noise Reduction Safety Ear Muffs for $10.97. Coupon code "IQ4G2LZS" cuts them to $8.78. With free shipping, that's tied with our mention from three weeks ago, $2 off, and the lowest price we could find. They feature a noise reduction sponge, retractable stainless steel at the end of headband for a custom fit, and anti-sweat material. Deal ends January 10.

title: Urban Decay at Nordstrom Rack
description: Nordstrom Rack cuts up to 67% off a selection of Urban Decay makeup, with deals starting from $6.97. Shipping starts at $5.95, but orders of $100 or more bag free shipping.

title: Gordini Women's Polartec Fleece Gloves
description: REI Garage offers the Gordini Women's Polartec Fleece Gloves in Black for $11.73. Opt for in-store pickup to dodge the $5.99 shipping fee. That's $8 off and the lowest price we could find. They're available in sizes from S to L.

title: 4K UHD Movie Downloads at FandangoNow
description:
FandangoNow takes 20% off a selection of movie downloads in 4K UHD via coupon code "4K18". Deal ends February 5. A couple of best bets, with prices after discount:
  • Blade Runner 2049 in 4K UHD for $15.99 (pictured, low by $4)
  • Spider-Man Homecoming in 4K UHD for $15.99 (low by $4)

title: Dell XPS Kaby Lake i7 Quad 16" 1080p Laptop
description: Dell Home, via its Member Purchase Program, offers its Dell XPS 15 Intel Kaby Lake Core i7 2.8GHz 15.6" 1080p Laptop for $1,273.99. Coupon code "TENOFF" cuts it to $1,146.59. With free shipping, that's $20 under our mention from a month ago, $303 off, and the lowest price we could find. It features an Intel Core i7-7700HQ 2.8GHz Kaby Lake quad-core processor, 15.6" 1920x1080 (1080p) LCD, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD, Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 4GB graphics, 9-cell battery, and Windows 10 Home 64-bit. Deal ends January 11.

title: Blinds.com Sale
description:
Blinds.com takes up to 30% off select blinds and shutters via coupon code "NEW-DEALS". Plus, all orders bag free shipping. Deal ends January 9. A couple of best bets, with prices after coupon:
  • Norman 2.5" Ultimate Faux-Wood Blind from $19.19 (at least $5 off)
  • Levolor Vinyl Vertical Blinds from $42.69 (pictured, at least $18 off)

title: Mission: Impossible Collection on Blu-ray/HD
description:
For pickup only, Best Buy offers the Mission: Impossible: The 5-Movie Collection on Blu-ray / Digital HD for $18.99 via the steps below. That's the lowest price we could find by $7, excluding the mention below. To get this deal:
  1. Add the Mission: Impossible: The 5-Movie Collection on Blu-ray / Digital HD to your cart for $19.99
  2. in cart, select "Shipping" for your delivery method (do not choose in-store pickup at this time)
  3. proceed to checkout
  4. at checkout in the shipping section, "$1 off" should appear in green text beside the "Today ... at a Best Buy store" option
  5. change your delivery method to this in-store pickup option to drop your total to $18.99
Too much effort? Amazon charges $19.99 with free Prime shipping.

title: Wells Fargo Cash Wise Visa® Card
Bedsure Printed Quilt Coverlet Sets
description:
Amazon discounts a selection of Bedsure Printed Quilt Coverlet Sets in several colors (Blue Aqua #9 pictured) via coupon code "ZP6JQOHP", as listed below. Plus, these items qualify for free shipping. Deal ends January 7. The sizes, with prices after coupon:
  • Twin for $16.19 ($11 off)
  • Full/Queen for $19.79 ($13 off)
  • King for $23.99 ($16 off)

title: Ann Taylor Sale
description:
Ann Taylor takes 50% off select styles via coupon code "REFRESH". Shipping adds a flat $8.95, but orders of $125 or more bag free shipping. (In-store pickup may also be available.) Some exclusions may apply. Deal ends January 9.

See all Ann Taylor Coupons.

title: Emilie Autumn "Wayward Victorian Girls" eBook
description: Amazon offers Emilie Autumn's The Asylum for Wayward Victorian Girls Kindle eBook for free. That's $7 off list and the lowest price we could find. It includes interactive elements such as audio tracks and hidden links.

title: Dell XPS Kaby Lake i5 Dual 13" Laptop
description:
Dell Home, via its Member Purchase Program, offers its Dell XPS 13 Intel Kaby Lake Core i5 2.5GHz 13.3" Laptop for $899.99 with free shipping. That's $200 off and the lowest price we could find. Features include:
  • Intel Core i5-7200U 2.5GHz Kaby Lake dual-core processor
  • 13.3" 1920x1080 (1080p) LCD display
  • 8GB RAM
  • 256GB SSD
  • Windows 10 Home 64-bit

title: Cuphead for PC
description:
CDKeys offers Steam downloads of Cuphead for Windows for $12.19. That's a buck under our mention from three weeks ago and the lowest price we've seen. (It also beats its recent Steam sale price by $5; it's the best deal now by $7.) Click here to see a short clip of its astonishing animation style.

Note: New customers can provide an email address on the CDKeys Facebook page to get a unique coupon code that cuts an extra 5% off.

title: Dynacraft Marvel Avengers 12-volt 4x4 Ride-On
description: Walmart offers the Dynacraft Marvel Avengers 12-volt 4x4 Ride-On for $159 with free shipping. That's $141 off and the lowest price we could find. It features a maximum speed of 5mph and adjustable seat belts.

title: Pier 1 Imports Sale and Clearance
description:
Pier 1 Imports takes up to 75% off during its One Big Sale and Clearance. (Prices are as marked.) Opt for in-store pickup where available to avoid shipping fees (which start at $5), or get free shipping on orders of $49 or more via coupon "FREESHIP49". Some exclusions may apply.

See all Pier 1 Imports Coupons.

title: Punk Royal Men's Printed Short-Sleeve Hoodie
description: Macy's offers the Punk Royal Men's Printed Short-Sleeve Hoodie in Black for $25.99. Coupon code "WKND" cuts the price to $20.79. Pad your order with a beauty item (they start at $3) to bag free shipping; otherwise, shipping adds $10.95. That's $23 off list and the lowest price we could find. It's available in sizes M to XXL. Deal ends January 7.

title: Calvin Klein Men's Slim-Fit Stretch Blazer
description: Macy's offers the Calvin Klein Men's Slim-Fit Stretch Textured Blazer in Cadet Navy for $66.93. Pad your order with a beauty item (they start at $3) to bag free shipping; otherwise, shipping adds $10.95. That's $131 off list and the lowest price we could find. It's available in sizes M to XXL.

title: Chase Sapphire Preferred® Card
National Tree Company Light Set Storage Bag
description: Macy's offers the National Tree Company Light Set Storage Bag Organizer in Red/ Black for $25.20. Coupon code "WKND" cuts the price to $21.42. Pad your order with a beauty item (they start at $3) to bag free shipping; otherwise, shipping adds $10.95. That's the lowest price we could find by $9. It features three removable section walls to provide four separate compartments. Deal ends January 7.

title: Gold's Gym Silicone Fitness Ring 2-Pack
description: Walmart offers the Gold's Gym Silicone Fitness Ring 2-Pack for $9.98. Opt for in-store pickup to dodge the $5.99 shipping fee and cut the price to $4.83. That's $5 under the lowest price we could find for a similar 2-pack. They have a lightweight design, are made of soft silicone material, and are suitable for any workout.

title: Merge Hologram Cube
description: Walmart offers the Merge Hologram Cube for $14.97. Opt for in-store pickup to drop it to $9. That's tied with our mention from two weeks ago and the lowest price we could find by $6. It lets you play your favorite games with virtual reality goggles.

title: Tommy Hilfiger Charles Messenger Bag
description: 6pm offers the Tommy Hilfiger Charles Messenger Bag in Natural for $27.99 plus $3.95 for shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $106. It features an interior zippered pocket.

title: G.H. Bass & Co. Men's Dixon Leather Duck Boot
description: Nashville Shoe Warehouse via eBay offers the G.H. Bass & Co. Men's Dixon Genuine Leather Lace-up Duck Boot in Dark Tan/Brown for $39.99 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $35. They're available in sizes from 7 to 13.

title: Elle 1-Year Subscription
description: Mercury Magazines offers an Elle 1-Year Subscription (12 issues) for free. That's tied with our October mention and the lowest price we could find by $5.

title: Joseph Joseph Wash & Drain Wash Basin
description: Amazon offers the Joseph Joseph Wash & Drain Wash Basin in White for $17.99 with free shipping for Prime members. That's the lowest price we could find by $4. It features an integrated plug and strainer and 2.35-gallon capacity.

title: Top 5 Deals You Need to Know This Morning: A Dyson at Its Lowest Price
description: Today you can make the idea of vacuuming a little more bearable by saving big on a Dyson. Check out this offer and more in our roundup of the top five Editors' Choice deals we found last night and this morning.

title: Oops! Apple Messed Up, But You Can Get a MUCH Cheaper Battery Out Of It
description: Recently it came to light that Apple has been slowing down batteries on older iPhones. Not surprisingly, users were unhappy with this news. But now, Apple is trying to make things right and regain their customers' trust.

title: Chase Hyatt Credit Card
8 Smart Ways to Save on Exercise Equipment
description: If your goal is to tone up and slim down this year, there are several ways to get the fitness equipment you need without breaking the bank. Check out our tips to help you save on exercise equipment, so you can stick to that resolution and get in shape.

title: 8 Things to Buy in January (and 3 Things to Wait On)
description: Ready or not, 2018 is here! That means we're done with the holiday sales and on to the post-holiday sales. While you won't find everything on sale in January, some items are real bargains this time of year — like gym memberships, bedding, and hotel stays.

title: SiriusXM 6-Month Subscriptions
description: SiriusXM offers your choice of a SiriusXM 6-Month Select Package or a SiriusXM 6-Month Streaming Package for $30. You'll need to cancel before the six months is over unless you want to renew at $15.99/month.

title: Bank of America® Travel Rewards Credit Card
AT&T Internet 50 w/ $50 Reward Card
description: With a 1-year service agreement, AT&T offers its AT&T Internet 50 service bundled with a $50 AT&T Visa Reward Card for $40 per month. (Scroll down to find the offer. A 12-month term is required.) It features speeds up to 50Mbps with up to 1TB of data per month. (Plan prices may vary by location.) Deal ends June 30.

title: Chase Sapphire Reserve℠ Card
4 Months of DirecTV Now w/ Apple TV 4K 32GB
description:
At DirecTV Now, prepay for four months of DirecTV Now service for $140 ($35/month) and receive the recently-released Apple TV 4K 32GB Media Receiver for free via the steps below. It features Apple's A10X Fusion chip, which is 2x faster and provides 4x GPU performance over the previous generation Apple TV. It also supports 4K HDR content via HDR 10 and Dolby Vision. This deal includes the "Live a Little" package from DirecTV Now, which offers over 60 channels to stream live, with many shows available on demand. After four months, you'll be billed $35/month for the service, but you may cancel at any time. To get this deal:
  1. On this page, click "Redeem & Stream"
  2. create your account
  3. select the "Live a Little" tab and click "Continue with this plan"
  4. on the add-ons page, click "Skip for now"
  5. choose the Apple TV 4K and click "Add to plan", then click "Continue"
  6. you'll see a final price of $140 on the checkout page
Note: You must use Chrome or Safari as your browser to get this deal.

title: Southwest Rapid Rewards® Plus Credit Card
Allstate Insurance Safe Driver Bonus Checks
description: At Allstate, you can earn two Safe Driving Bonus Checks for every year you're accident free. Request a quote now and see how much you save.
